title: Monday Morning Confessions + Dumb Debate Of The Day + Update On Mike D's Face Tattoo
itunes:title: Monday Morning Confessions + Dumb Debate Of The Day + Update On Mike D's Face Tattoo
description:
Listeners call in to share their Monday Morning Confessions. The show debates whether or not to refrigerate a specific condiment. Also, Mike D tells what his girlfriend thinks about him getting a face tattoo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
